snippet.title: Trials Fusion Awesome Level Max Announcement Trailer [US]
snippet.description:
Trials Fusion gets even more awesome on July 14!

For existing owners of Trials Fusion, get ready for our biggest DLC pack yet. Immerse yourself in a unique Trials experience through the 2 separately themed events of this fresh new content pack:

-       The Awesome Adventure is a funny and previously unseen Trials gaming experience, including a unique unicorn-riding cat!

-       RedLynx vs All-Stars is a collection of 22 new tracks, half of them created by RedLynx’s track developers and the other half made by the very best track creators from all around the world!
In total, this new DLC pack features 30 all-new tracks plus 10 Supercross tracks, 30 unexpected and various challenges to complete, unicorn bike & cat rider, 5 new garage items and more than 130 fresh new Editor objects.

For newcomers to Trials Fusion, The Awesome Max Edition includes the base game, all 6 DLC packs from the Season Pass, and the new Awesome Level Max DLC. Over 180 tracks, Online Multiplayer Mode, Tournament mode, customizations, unicorns, explosions and more!
The Awesome Level Max DLC and The Awesome Max Edition will be available on the Xbox Store, PlayStation Store, and via PC digital download on July 14th!

FOR ALL THE LATEST:
Go to our official site: http://trials.ubi.com
Like us on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/trials.official
Follow us on Twitter: https://twitter.com/trialsgames
